articles.title: Europe heatwave: Students forced to flee Portugal wildfire - BBC
articles.description: The Oxford graduates say the wildfire was following cars as they fled their villa in Portugal.
articles.content:
A group of British students have told how they had to flee the wildfires in Portugal when they woke up to flames outside their villa window.
Dozens of fires are burning across Europe as temperatures… [+2554 chars]
